attackTemplate: ATTACKER targets TARGET with a distance of RANGE
discordInviteTitle: Any ideas? Feedback? Want to help translate the website to you language? Join our discord!
partyHint: Click on the tiles to add/move heroes. Click on the party list to add/change heroes!
dialogHint: You can also press enter to select first hero in the list
shareDialogInfo: Copy this link to share your layout!
helpDialogCharAiTypesDesc: Heroes have a couple different AI presets, that matter during the target selection.
helpDialogMeleeAiInfoDesc: Heroes with Melee AI, target the nearest untargeted hero. If none are available, they target the nearest hero instead.
helpDialogRangedAiInfoDesc: Heroes with Ranged AI target the nearest hero.
helpDialogAllyAiInfoDesc: Heroes with Buffer AI, try to buff their allies; they target the furthest allied hero.
helpDialogAssassinAiInfoDesc: Heroes with Assassin AI target heroes with a specific class. If there are multiple enemy heroes of that class, they try to target the closest untargeted hero with that class. If there is a hero with that class in the enemy team, they target it, regardless if it's targeted or not. If the enemy team has no heroes with that class, Assassin AI heroes use Melee targeting instead. You can check which class is being targeted by the, by hovering over the hero portrait.
helpDialogOrderMattersDesc: When planning, don't forget to make sure, that your heroes are in the correct order! Targeting goes from party leader to the last character in your team, so the order matters a lot. The same goes for the enemy team.
helpDialogThingsToConsiderDesc: There are more things to Colosseum, than initial targeting. Advanced Colosseum players should also consider taunts and target reset! For target reset info, consider watching this video
creditsDialogInfoDesc: This web app was created thanks to continuous support of many people. This is list of these great people!
creditsDialogRestThanksDesc: Thanks to Kong studios and Kakaogames for making this awesome game, 1D-Gamer for lots of information about Colosseum inner workings and another big thanks to you, the user!
creditsDialogDevelopThanksDescWorm: TheWorm - Idea, Programming, Design, Russian translation
creditsDialogDevelopThanksDescPoteto: Poteto aka Oukaya aka FleurDeLis - I ahve to thank the owner of all those names for Design and German translation(and for putting hats on cats)
creditsDialogDevelopThanksDescProcyon: Procyon - Simplified Chinese and Japanese translation
creditsDialogDevelopThanksDescMachina_Sa: Machina_Sacra - Headhunting(a.k.a providing information about heroes and their images)
noTeamsToDisplay: No teams to display! Please save a team first!
